channel.title: Nature on Roman Matvienko
channel.description: Recent content in Nature on Roman Matvienko

item.title: Fish
item.description: Last night I came across a fish on the footpath near my house. Over the past year living here, I’ve run into (and tried not to step on) countless snails, toads, and lizards. People have warned me about snakes, but I haven’t seen one yet. And I have never expected to encounter a fish — fish inhabit bodies of water, and paths are not part of those. And yet, there it was: a fish, lying in the middle of the path.
